title: Having issue with camera app, and astro mode quality of pictures, need help.
content:
1. Astro mode pictures are bad having too much noise, and sometimes green tint. I was taking it in no light polution place on tripod, still bad results. 
2. There is annoying lag after taking photo and trying to delete it right away from camera app, phone freezes and after 3 seconds jumps to third picture and not one after deleted ones.
